import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import sessionReducer from'./session';import thunk from"redux-thunk";var rootReducer=combineReducers({// add reducer functions here
session:sessionReducer});var enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="production"){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{var logger=require("redux-logger").default;var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}var configureStore=function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
